amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being obligated or expended to conduct the San Gabriel River Watershed and Mountains Special Resource Study in certain designated cities in California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used conduct the San Gabriel Watershed and Mountains Special Resource Study in the cities of Diamond Bar, La Habra, Industry, Chino Hills, and the community of Rowland Heights in Los Angeles County, California.

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.
